knimeNode.name: dBase Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads data from a dBase database file or URL location. Upon executing the node will scan the input file to determine number and types of the columns and output a table with the auto-guessed structure.

fullDescription.intro: Reads a data table from a dBase file format. The support of this old format is minimalistic: we only read data, without query nor index.

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: the path to the dBase file to read
when rows are marked as deleted in the file, should we still read them?

tab.name: Limit rows
tab.option: the maximum count of rows to read from the files; only the first N rows will be read

ports.outPort: Table read from the dBase file
